title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in Clarence, MO | NEMO Chiropractic
description: Mind Body Connection in Clarence, MO. NEMO Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Clarence serving all of your needs. Call us today at (660) 384-2066 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
